publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-73 Mr Mike Rumbles: Publication of Register of Interests- That the Parliament agrees that on or after 2 July 1999 the register of interests of Members of the Parliament be printed in a loose-leaf folder to be kept at the office of the Clerk of the Parliament and published on the Parliament’s website.

S1M-73 Mr Mike Rumbles: Publication of Register of Interests—That the Parliament agrees that on or after 2 July 1999 the register of interests of Members of the Parliament be printed in a loose-leaf folder to be kept at the office of the Clerk of the Parliament and published on the Parliament’s website. (lodged on 24 June 1999)
